plot: Various cases and issues on which the court has already ruled are drawn from the archives of a Moroccan court. A TV series that aims to raise awareness of the public to the problems of justice.
plot_en: Various cases and issues on which the court has already ruled are drawn from the archives of a Moroccan court. A TV series that aims to raise awareness of the public to the problems of justice.
plot_es: Various cases and issues on which the court has already ruled are drawn from the archives of a Moroccan court. A TV series that aims to raise awareness of the public to the problems of justice.
title: Moudawala
